QuestData.Title: Tracking a Wild God
QuestData.Description:
Dis be a dark place, $n. We gotta track down da spirit who be trapped here.
Me tink me can pick up its trail... but dat be all dis ol' shadow hunter can do.
If me be tryin' ta fight wit' ya, da threads dat be tyin' me ta Azeroth might break. Den I gonna be stuck here, too.
C'mon. We best be moving.
QuestData.LogDescription: Track down the missing spirits of Ardenweald.
QuestData.RewardText: We ain't done wit' dis place yet. Dere be loa trapped here!

Objectives.Objective: Ashamane absorbed into the soulkeeper crystal
